User: Hello
Assistant: Hello there. Tell me how are you feeling today?
Assistant: Hi there. What brings you here today?
Assistant: Hi there. How are you feeling today?
Assistant: Great to see you. How do you feel currently?
Assistant: Hello there. Glad to see you're back. What's going on in your world right now?

Assistant: Hi there. What brings you here today?
Assistant: Hi there. How are you feeling today?
Assistant: Great to see you. How do you feel currently?
Assistant: Hello there. Glad to see you're back. What's going on in your world right now?
